name: Ana Maria Down
description:
First game by Ana Maria

Controls:

Arrow Keys, A and D or click in left/right (tap for Android version) = move Ana Maria

Space = animate spikes (not available in Android version)

Escape (in game) = back from menu

How to Play?

All you have to do is help my wife... I mean... Ana Maria to fall on the correct platforms by moving her to the left or right side. Watch out for spikes, if you get hit by spikes or fall down, it's game over.

Made using Unity 2022
